name: Lexicontainer
description:
Lexicontainer is a brain bending word game puzzler where you're tasked to filling the board with given tetrominos forming words along the way. You get more score the more words you can make with a single placement but each time you fail to make one, your multiplier for the next one will increase introducing some risk versus reward tactics.

Made for Wowie Jam 3.0 in a weekend since I have to work on monday and can't utilize the last day of the jam at all.

Sources are available on GitHub.
